name: BADPDF Malicious PDF Creator
author: Assaf Baharav
Yaron Fruchtmann
Ido Solomon
Richard Davy - secureyourit.co.uk
description:
This module can either creates a blank PDF file which contains a UNC link which can be used
          to capture NetNTLM credentials, or if the PDFINJECT option is used it will inject the necessary
          code into an existing PDF document if possible.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: DisablePayloadHandler
options.description: Disable the handler code for the selected payload

options.name: LHOST
options.description: Host listening for incoming SMB/WebDAV traffic

options.name: PDFINJECT
options.description: Path and filename to existing PDF to inject UNC link code into
